name: Monsters of Memory
description:
Monsters of Memory

A memory tile game with RPG twists and a cute cat girl!

Amia lost her memories, and you've been tasked with her recovery. Use spell tiles to help her, buy potions and bombs, unlock new outfits, and discover unique endings!

Patron bonuses:
Bonus outfits
+500 starting gold

My monsterfolk games are free thanks to my Patrons! Supporters get access to early builds for beta testing, sneak peaks at development, in-game bonuses, and more!

Support more free monster games!

A full list of the game's endings and how to obtain them can be found on the Wiki! (Warning: Spoilers)

Patch Notes:Sept 2
+ Bombs now appear in the shop after load if unlocked

+ 'Keep going' option added to end of game
